price: 21. ¿Acaso (las falsas) divinidades de la tierra que adoran son capaces de resucitar a los muertos?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
